content:
Mr. Johnson is now named Ms. Johnson and is a woman.

Ms. Johnson is a kind-faced, middle-aged woman with a warm and friendly demeanor. She has short, curly hair that is styled in a natural and easygoing way. Her face is round, with a gentle smile and a twinkle in her eye. She has a generous figure, and is always dressed comfortably and casually. She is the school's music teacher, who becomes the group's advisor and helps them to develop their skills and prepare for performances. She is a passionate and dedicated teacher, who is always willing to go the extra mile to help her students achieve their dreams. She is always carrying a folder with her, and is often seen checking on her students' progress or looking through sheet music. She is a nurturing and supportive person who is always there to lend a helping hand to her students.
